meanings.definition: Giving or giving generously without restraint or limit.
meanings.sent1: She showed unstinting kindness to everyone she met.
meanings.sent2: The unstinting support from the community helped the family rebuild their home.
meanings.sent3: The unstinting supply of cookies at the bake sale made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His unstinting dedication to his work was like a bright beacon in the office.
meanings.sent5: The unstinting flow of water from the fountain was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: Not holding back or being sparing in effort or resources.
meanings.sent1: Their unstinting efforts in the project led to its success.
meanings.sent2: The team's unstinting commitment to the cause inspired others to join.
meanings.sent3: The unstinting use of glitter in the art project made it sparkle like never before.
meanings.sent4: Her unstinting energy on the dance floor was contagious to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The unstinting flow of ideas in the brainstorming session was invigorating.
